column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place and have been here several times.  It is in a fabulous location
column3: and good authentic Spanish food and Sangria.  I went most recently with a Spanish friend of mine who also loved the food.  We had the classic old faithful jamòn serrano with queso manchego
column4: pan con tomate and olives.  We also ordered the pinxos platter which was not your traditional pinxos in terms of bread with a tapa on tap (more or less) but were still very tasty.  The sangria was also delicious and not too sugary.  When it's nice outside
column5: you can sit in this outdoor covered patio area.  Definitely check this place out!
